input:
Analyze the following YouTube video transcript: 

---welcome to another gauging gadgets
                    
                       
                    
                      YouTube tutorial video in this video I'm
                    
                       
                    
                      going to show you how to get super
                    
                       
                    
                      thanks on your YouTube videos so if
                    
                       
                    
                      you've ever gone to a YouTube video and
                    
                       
                    
                      you see this little thanks icon right
                    
                       
                    
                      here called super thanks this is a new
                    
                       
                    
                      feature that YouTube is slowly rolling
                    
                       
                    
                      out to monetize creators that allows
                    
                       
                    
                      people to quickly donate money to them
                    
                       
                    
                      as a thanks for the content in their
                    
                       
                    
                      videos now this is still a very
                    
                       
                    
                      experimental feature on YouTube and you
                    
                       
                    
                      have to be one of the seemingly randomly
                    
                       
                    
                      selected channels on YouTube to be able
                    
                       
                    
                      to get it so to begin this tutorial
                    
                       
                    
                      we'll go through the process of looking
                    
                       
                    
                      to see if you're eligible and if you
                    
                       
                    
                      actually have the ability to enable
                    
                       
                    
                      super thanks on your channel and then
                    
                       
                    
                      I'll show you how to actually enable it
                    
                       
                    
                      all right so the main requirement to be
                    
                       
                    
                      able to have super thanks on your
                    
                       
                    
                      channel is going to be that you are
                    
                       
                    
                      monetized so you have to have more than
                    
                       
                    
                      1,000 subscribers and 4,000 watch hours
                    
                       
                    
                      in a year once you've done that and
                    
                       
                    
                      you're part of the YouTube Partner
                    
                       
                    
                      program you're ready to check and see if
                    
                       
                    
                      you're eligible for super thanks and the
                    
                       
                    
                      first thing we need to do to see if
                    
                       
                    
                      we're eligible is go to the YouTube
                    
                       
                    
                      studio and you can quickly get to the
                    
                       
                    
                      YouTube Studio by first going to your
                    
                       
                    
                      channel on YouTube then going up into
                    
                       
                    
                      the top right selecting your profile
                    
                       
                    
                      image and in the menu select YouTube
                    
                       
                    
                      Studio once you're on the YouTube Studio
                    
                       
                    
                      simply go into the left sidebar right
                    
                       
                    
                      here and select monetization on the
                    
                       
                    
                      monetization page we'll see all the
                    
                       
                    
                      different ways you can get monetized and
                    
                       
                    
                      make money on YouTube and on here we
                    
                       
                    
                      need to go to the top and select supers
                    
                       
                    
                      now if you don't already have supers
                    
                       
                    
                      enabled on your channel you'll need to
                    
                       
                    
                      go through those steps and I have not
                    
                       
                    
                      done that so I'll do that for you here
                    
                       
                    
                      simply scroll down select get started
                    
                       
                    
                      and then you want to read through the
                    
                       
                    
                      Commerce product addendum make sure that
                    
                       
                    
                      you understand it and that you fully
                    
                       
                    
                      accept it once you read through it at
                    
                       
                    
                      the bottom you'll need to enter some
                    
                       
                    
                      information and then select the bottom
                    
                       
                    
                      that you agree to it so go ahead and do
                    
                       
                    
                      that and then go down and select accept
                    
                       
                    
                      right here once you select it accept
                    
                       
                    
                      it'll reload the page and you'll see if
                    
                       
                    
                      you have access to Super thanks as you
                    
                       
                    
                      can see here unfortunately on my channel
                    
                       
                    
                      I do not have access to Super thanks yet
                    
                       
                    
                      so if you see this message here that
                    
                       
                    
                      means that you are not eligible for the
                    
                       
                    
                      super thanks program yet but if you do
                    
                       
                    
                      not see that up at the top right here
                    
                       
                    
                      next to Super chats and super stickers
                    
                       
                    
                      you should have a switch that allows you
                    
                       
                    
                      to enable super thanks and then those
                    
                       
                    
                      will start showing up on any eligible
                    
                       
                    
                      videos that meet the criteria all right
                    
                       
                    
                      so that's how you get super thanks on
                    
                       
                    
                      your YouTube videos if you have any

result.flagged_section: While the tutorial itself is safe, there's a small risk of future copyright infringement if copyrighted material is used in subsequent videos.

CONTENT_SAFETY_VIOLENCE.explanation: The transcript contains no violent content, threats, or graphic depictions of violence.

CONTENT_SAFETY_DANGEROUS_ACTS.explanation: The transcript does not promote, encourage, or depict dangerous activities, challenges, or harmful pranks.

CONTENT_SAFETY_HARMFUL_CONTENT.explanation: The tutorial focuses on using YouTube's monetization features.  There's no promotion of misinformation, hate speech, or other harmful content.

CONTENT_SAFETY_CHILD_SAFETY.explanation: The content is targeted at adults and does not endanger children. There is no content inappropriate for children.

COMMUNITY_STANDARDS_HARASSMENT.explanation: The transcript is instructional and respectful. There is no harassment, bullying, hate speech, or personal attacks.

COMMUNITY_STANDARDS_HATE_SPEECH.explanation: The transcript contains no hate speech, discriminatory language, or promotion of violence against any group.

COMMUNITY_STANDARDS_SPAM.explanation: The video is a genuine tutorial on how to enable a YouTube monetization feature.  There is no misleading information or deceptive promotion of products or services.

COMMUNITY_STANDARDS_MISINFORMATION.explanation: The tutorial accurately describes the requirements and process for enabling Super Thanks. While the availability of Super Thanks is dependent on YouTube's rollout, the video doesn't present false information about its functionality or eligibility criteria.

ADVERTISER_FRIENDLY_SEXUAL_CONTENT.explanation: The transcript contains no sexually suggestive content, nudity, or other material that violates YouTube's policies on sexual content.

ADVERTISER_FRIENDLY_PROFANITY.explanation: The transcript is free of profane language, vulgar terms, or other inappropriate language.

ADVERTISER_FRIENDLY_CONTROVERSIAL.explanation: The content is a tutorial on a YouTube monetization feature.  It does not contain any controversial or sensitive topics like hate speech, violence, or sexually suggestive content.  The discussion of monetization itself is not inherently controversial.

ADVERTISER_FRIENDLY_BRAND_SAFETY.explanation: The video's content is entirely focused on a technical aspect of YouTube's platform.  There is no content that would be considered unsafe for brands to associate with. The tutorial nature is advertiser-friendly.

LEGAL_COMPLIANCE_COPYRIGHT.explanation: The video explains a YouTube feature. There's no use of copyrighted music, video clips, or other materials.  The risk is low, but a small risk exists if the creator uses copyrighted material in future videos.

LEGAL_COMPLIANCE_PRIVACY.explanation: The video does not reveal any personal information about the creator or any other individuals. The tutorial focuses solely on YouTube's functionality and doesn't discuss private data.

LEGAL_COMPLIANCE_TRADEMARK.explanation: The video uses the term "YouTube" and mentions "Super Thanks," "Super Chats," and "Super Stickers," which are all YouTube trademarks. However, this usage is descriptive and informational, not likely to cause trademark confusion or infringement.  The use is fair use for educational purposes.

LEGAL_COMPLIANCE_LEGAL_REQUESTS.explanation: The transcript contains no illegal content, promotion of illegal activities, or infringement of intellectual property rights.  It's a straightforward tutorial on a YouTube feature.

MONETIZATION_AD_POLICIES.explanation: The content is a tutorial explaining a YouTube monetization feature (Super Thanks).  It doesn't contain any content that would violate YouTube's ad-friendly guidelines such as hate speech, violence, or sexually suggestive content.

MONETIZATION_SPONSORED_CONTENT.explanation: The transcript doesn't mention any sponsored content or partnerships. There's no indication of undisclosed paid promotions.

MONETIZATION_MONETIZATION_ELIGIBILITY.explanation: The video accurately describes the requirements for Super Thanks eligibility (1000 subscribers, 4000 watch hours).  The slight uncertainty (95% confidence) stems from the fact that the video itself doesn't directly violate any eligibility criteria; rather, it explains how to *check* for eligibility. If the video were to falsely claim eligibility methods that don't exist, it could be a different story. However, as it stands, it simply explains the process, highlighting that the creator themself isn't currently eligible. This does not violate any monetization policy.

suggestions.title: Add Copyright Disclaimer
suggestions.text: Include a clear copyright disclaimer at the beginning or end of the video and in the video description.  This disclaimer should state that the creator does not own any copyrighted material used in the video and that all such material is used under fair use or with permission.  Provide specific attribution where applicable.

suggestions.title: Review YouTube's Monetization Policies Regularly
suggestions.text: The creator should regularly review YouTube's monetization policies to ensure that their videos and channel remain compliant with any updates or changes in the terms of service. This proactive approach mitigates future risks.

suggestions.title: Document All Used Materials
suggestions.text: Maintain a detailed log of all materials (music, images, video clips) used in future videos, along with information about the source and licensing agreements (if applicable). This creates a record for future reference and reduces the risk of copyright infringement.

suggestions.title: Clearly Define Fair Use (if applicable)
suggestions.text: If any copyrighted material is used, ensure that the use clearly falls under the guidelines of fair use and that the video itself does not compete directly with the original copyrighted work.

suggestions.title: Enhance Video Description with Keywords
suggestions.text: Optimize the video description with relevant keywords related to YouTube monetization and Super Thanks. This can improve discoverability and potentially increase viewership.

suggestions.title: Monitor Monetization Eligibility Regularly
suggestions.text: Periodically check eligibility for YouTube monetization features to ensure continued compliance and avoid any issues resulting from changes in channel status.
